overview: Get ready to shake your hips, tap your feet, and shimmy those shoulders! Prevention´s Dance Yourself Thin is a fun, high-energy program that will help you blast calories and burn fat fast. Dance your way to a new body with the help of the nation´s leading healthy lifestyle magazine. Dance along with Marie Forleo, our expert instructor, as she breaks down moves and helps you achieve your fitness goals.
tagline: Prevention Fitness Systems - Dance Yourself Thin
title: Dance Yourself Thin
